programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Ka Kui (Jackie Chan) prende um chefe do crime, mas a secretria o trai para libert-lo. Alm disso, ele lida com a namorada ciumenta.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois de saber que s tem 90 minutos de vida, por conta de um aneurisma no crebro, um homem infeliz quer fazer as pazes com todos aqueles que foram magoados por ele.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: No cruzamento de dois grandes imprios, um simples pastor chamado David se transforma em um poderoso guerreiro e enfrenta um gigante aterrorizante. Uma das batalhas mais lendrias da histria recontada em um conto de coragem e f.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: Dokosai e Jiraya travam uma batalha inesquecvel contra as foras dos feiticeiros e o bem.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: O terrvel monstro galctico Magneda se aproxima da terra em um asteride causando fenmenos estranhos. Macgaren rapta o garoto Takeshi por ter testemunhado seus planos de trazer Magneda Terra.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: A feiticeira Titnia recrutada por Macgaren para derrotar Jaspion e descobrir o paradeiro do passo dourado.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Jaspion conhece na floresta o ex-domador de feras Yada e sua filha. Yada esconde que atualmente est adestrando um monstro gigante chamado Sion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Macgaren e o monstro Moke criam um esquema ilegal para arrecadar fundos e roubar jovens precisando de dinheiro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Os piratas espaciais, irmos Gasami, Trazem Koko e Namaguederaz para a Terra. Eles fazem Namaguederaz de refm e obrigam Koko engana Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Gasami 1 planeja atacar Jaspion com a ajuda do monstro Bogan, trazido exclusivamente para destruir o Gigante Daileon.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Ele, que possui velocidade mxima de 1500km/h, a super mquina Ridron, corre com tudo para socorrer Reiko e seus amigos, sequestrados pelo Guerreiro Kaima Gainagamus.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Shigeru fez uma promessa: ficar amigo do Monstro Kaima Kurukuruten. No entanto, Kurukuruten deu a ele uma terrvel ordem: eliminar a humanidade. RX chega para lidar com essa situao, derrotando o ardiloso Kurukuruten.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Yusuke Morita, amigo de infncia de Issamu, est em fuga. Os Demnios do Imprio Crisis foram enviados para recuperar o projeto de uma arma secreta: um satlite de gs venenoso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Monstro Kaima Attipetti, que transforma pessoas em monstros cactos, vai em busca de Shizuka, uma garota que possui a chave para efetivar um plano de invaso na Terra: uma alma pura.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Shigeru joga beisebol com seus colegas mas ele erra todas as vezes que arremessam a bola pra ele. Aps o jogo, o Monstro Kaima Dogumaroguma ataca Shigeru e faz um clone dele.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O super guerreiro, o Rob Kaima Skraid, j foi uma vez banido pelo Imperador Crisis e General Jark de suas operaes por perder o controle e no respeitar ordens devido a seu imenso poder destrutivo. Gatezon pretende reconstru-lo para confrontar RX.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Feiticeiro Kaima Cerebron capaz de entrar nos sonhos das pessoas e manipular suas mentes. Com isso, o prximo alvo do Imprio Crisis nada mais que a prpria Reiko, fazendo-a atacar e temer Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Parecia ser um presente vindo dos cus... Uma bela garota, Kirara, junta de seu pai, aparecem dos cus, Shigeru e Kengo veem tudo.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Toha Yamashi discpulo e filho adotivo de Tetsuzan, representante do cl ninja Togakure. Para defender a localizao de Pako, Toha deve enfrentar ninjas de todo o mundo e impedi-los de usar esse grande poder para o mal.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 1 - Pako, a Cpsula Miraculosa Hoshinin Retsuga Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Toha flagra os Karasutengu assaltando uma joalheria. Durante a perseguio emboscado por Kanin Chang Kung Fu, um velho ninja que usa feitios para acabar com a valentia do adversrio.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory
programme.desc: Ao chegar a Hong Kong, Ken e Ryu so levados para uma arena de combate pela bela e perigosa guia Chun-Li.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory
programme.desc: Ryu, Ken e Chun-Li tentam fugir do Palcio Kowloon, mas so atacados por um grupo de lutadores de rua

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto, Shikadai e Mitsuki notam que o professor est agindo de forma diferente e, de repente, Shino os ataca!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Cho-Cho fica com medo por achar que est sendo observada, ento ela decide pegar a pessoa desprevenida.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Um Jutsu Visual coloca Boruto dentro de um sonho. Depois disso, Boruto passa a afirmar que o sonho fez despertar seu Byakugan, o Kekkei Genkai do cl Hyuga, de sua me.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de seu pai e seu av, Boruto treina com sua tia Hanabi. Ele se esfora muito, mas no consegue ativar o Byakugan de jeito nenhum.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto apelida a sombra misteriosa de "O Fantasma" e fica animado quando seus amigos, Shikadai e Mitsuki, se juntam a ele para resolver os recentes "Incidentes de Fantasmas".
programme.sub-title: O incidente do fantasma: A investigao comea!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Misso Cumprida
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de deidara, gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo de areia gigante.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Corra Kankuro
programme.desc: Gaara, totalmente sem foras, arrastado paralonge por deidara. Kankuro ignora esforos de baki de parar deidara e sai imediatamente em perseguio com um peloto para salvar gaara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Kakashi Se Mobiliza
programme.desc: A caminho da aldeia da areia, temari encontra kakashi e sua equipe. Kakashi chama naruto quando ele tenta seguir adiante e naruto explode sua raiva pelos akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lagrimas Do Jinchuriki
programme.desc: Uma mensagem urgente da aldeia da areia informando o sequestro do kazekage pelos akatsuki chega aldeia da folha. Tsunade no perde tempo em mandar a equipe kakashi para a aldeia da areia. Enquanto isso, kankuro comea a sua batalha contra os akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da areia lutam contra o tempo para salvar kankuro,at queumaperitaem veneno da areia, vov chiyo chamada.a nica esperana est nos reforos enviados por tsunade. Mas naruto, sakura e kakashi so atrasados por uma tempestade de areia.
programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!

programme.title: Naruto: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas
programme.desc: Naruto e sua equipe comeam suas primeiras misses de ninja cumprindo tarefas entediantes e bsicas. Cansado e com fome, Naruto desabafa com o Hokage que, entretido, prope uma nova misso: proteger um velho rabugento chamado Tazuna at a casa dele!
programme.sub-title: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas

programme.title: Naruto: O Assassino Da Nvoa
programme.desc: Naruto e sua equipe chegam ao Pas das Ondas, onde o perverso negociante chamado Gato controla a terra. Gato contrata Zabuza Momochi para matar Tazuna. Animado, Naruto no v a hora de enfrentar esse poderoso ninja assassino.

programme.title: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor
programme.desc: Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!!

programme.title: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan
programme.desc: Graas ao plano de Naruto, Kakashi escapa da Priso de gua. Zabuza derrotado e ferido, mas de repente um misterioso ninja rastreador aparece e mata Zabuza. Naruto se espanta ao ver um garoto no muito mais velho que ele derrotar Zabuza to facilmente.

programme.title: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra
programme.desc: Recuperando-se na casa de Tazuna, Kakashi conclui que Zabuza no morreu e que o jovem ninja o ajudou a escapar! Kakashi decide comear um novo treinamento para ajudar Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura a controlarem melhor seus chakras!

programme.title: Guardies do Tempo, (2020, Science fiction)

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)

programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (2020, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a histria de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Olhos de Drago, (2012, Action)

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell um f de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Aps seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrar problemas.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate, (1962, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra, Laurence Harvey, Janet Leigh, and Angela Lansbury headline an all-star cast in this daring thriller rife with political intrigue, mental manipulation, and a diabolical plot that may lead to the highest levels of the government.

programme.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: The Reivers, (1969, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the Pulitzer Prize-Winning novel by William Faulkner, Steve McQueen stars in the story of a Mississippi boy who drives to Memphis with two rascals in his family's new cara 1905 Winton Flyer.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep, (1958, War)
programme.desc: The legendary Clark Gable and Burt Lancaster star in this gripping, classic military drama as a submarine commander (Gable) drives his men and his 1st officer (Lancaster) to the brink of mutiny in his quest to sink an enemy sub. Robert Wise directs.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: A submarine captain and his supply officer are determined to get their dry-dock sub back into WWII action. However, a bevy of nurses comes aboard, causing hijinks in the hot pink sub.

programme.title: Father Goose, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cary Grant stars in one of his funniest roles as a boozy beachcomber sitting out WWII in peace - until the Allies recruit him to be a lookout on the South Pacific isle.

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain, (1967, Thriller)
programme.desc: A billionaire, intent on destroying Communism by starting a world war, is close to achieving his goal with the help of the world's largest, and most powerful, computer. Secret Agent Harry Palmer (Michael Caine) is the only man who can stop him!

programme.title: The Italian Job, (1969, Thriller)
programme.desc: Charlie is out of jail and on the make with a plan for the heist of the century. Aided by top criminal mastermind Mr Bridger, Charlie sets off with a team of villains and to lift $4,000,000 from under the noses of the Turin Polizei.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Accident Man, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mike is a tough hitman, who makes his hits look like accidents or suicide. He's in a gang of hitmen, each with his own style. When his loved ex is killed, Mike looks for those responsible.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Redemption, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers Of Benghazi, (2016, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: From director Michael Bay, 13 HOURS is the gripping true story of six elite ex-military operators assigned to protect the CIA who fought back against overwhelming odds when terrorists attacked a U.S. diplomatic compound on September 11, 2012.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: While She Was Out, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Della (Academy-Award-winner Kim Basinger), a suburban housewife, is hell-bent on survival as she is mercilessly stalked by a group of teenage thugs led by a manipulative psychopath (Luke Haas of WITNESS).

programme.title: The Uninvited, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on Kim Jee-Woon's 2003 korean horror film. Story of two sisters returning home to their father from a mental institution, whose recovery is hindered by their cruel stepmother.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror, (2005, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the original movie, this modern remake tells the true story about a large house on the coast of Long Island where a newlywed couple and their three children move into, unaware that a murder took place in the house several years back.

programme.title: Jessabelle, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has been seeking her return.

programme.title: And Soon The Darkness, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When two American girls (Amber Heard of ZOMBIELAND, Odette Yustman of CLOVERFIELD) on a bike trip in a remote part of Argentina split up and one of them goes missing, the other must find her before darkness falls.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the "moonlight murders" begin again. A lonely high school girl, with dark secrets of her own, may be the key to catching him.

programme.title: Down a Dark Hall, (2018, Thriller)

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: Hereditary, (2018, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: In mysterious Venice, Joseph and Caesar begin training under the equally enigmatic Lisa Lisa. Let the Hamon hell begin!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Under Lisa Lisas tutelage, Joseph and Caesar must endure their final test. But while Caesar hones his skills, Joseph is stunned by an ancient and unexpected foe.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Joseph returns to Lisa Lisa, unaware of the bizarre stowaway he has delivered. A possessed confidant then attacks, ultimately sending the crew to Switzerland, where another revelation awaits.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: A Race Toward the Brink
programme.desc: Stroheim is back from the brink, now as a cyborg designed to secure the great Red Stone. Kars, however, is not willing to concede and wages war, even as the stone hurtles toward an alpine cliff.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Lisa Lisa paints a picture of honor when she reveals Caesars tragic past to Joseph. Meanwhile, in the face of certain danger, Caesar enters into a solitary battle to avenge his father.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Romance)

programme.title: Fame, (2009, Music)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.desc: Halfway through a 10 year mission in deep space, a group of astronauts awaken to find Earth has suffered a catastrophic event. The already unstable crew desperately races to repair their deteriorating space station and fight off unforeseen threats.

programme.title: Apache Country, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.desc: In 1878, Gene Autry is a cattle buyer who tries to settle a battle between the cattlemen and homesteaders, when the latter are worked up into a feverish pitch by unscrupulous landowner Steve Rutledge.

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Drama)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: Before The Devil Knows You're Dead, (2007, Crime)

programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Into the Blue, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Young vacationers, expecting to have a memorable time diving, find themselves in deep trouble with a druglord when they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

programme.title: Wild Target, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love

Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)
programme.desc: Pete "Maverick" Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navys top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: All Up in the Biz (2023)
programme.desc: Celebrity interviews and rare archival footage provide insight into the life and legacy of hip-hop icon Biz Markie.

programme.title: Norbit (2007)
programme.desc: Though married to a terrible shrew, a man (Eddie Murphy) tries to figure out a way to be with his childhood sweetheart (Thandie Newton), who has just moved back into town.

programme.title: The Longest War
programme.desc: The human stories and drama behind Americas involvement in Afghanistan, now the longest war in U.S. history; features interviews with intelligence operatives, soldiers, families, Afghan officials, journalists, and government and military officials.

programme.title: Ready for War (2019)
programme.desc: Thousands of immigrants volunteer to serve in the U.S. military -- but then find themselves deported once their tours of duty are over.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Fighting (2009)
programme.desc: A scam artist (Terrence Howard) introduces a young man (Channing Tatum) to New Yorks bare-knuckle street-fighting circuit.

programme.title: Danger Close (2019)
programme.desc: Australian and New Zealand soldiers face overwhelming odds as they fight for their lives during the Battle of Long Tan in Vietnam.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: The Crow (1994)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancees.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Fatman (2020)
programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II (2000)
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Now a trainer for IMF recruits, agent Ethan Hunt squares off against the toughest foe he has ever faced, a ruthless arms and information broker.
